name: NoteWorthy Composer File
summary: Learn about .NWC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NWC files can be loaded, performed, and printed using the free NoteWorthy Composer Viewer application.

description: Music composition created with NoteWorthy Composer, a notation authoring tool for Windows; can create, record, edit, print and play back musical scores in pure music notation.
